source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video opens from a low-angle perspective, looking up from the bottom left foreground at the yurt's wooden lattice ceiling in the middle and background, with a white heater positioned on the right. The camera then pans right while moving forward, transitioning to a chest-level view that sweeps across the interior. This movement reveals a kitchenette in the middle ground, which shifts from the right to the center of the frame, followed by a blue armchair and a wooden door appearing on the right side in the middle ground and background. As the camera continues its forward pan, a light-wood chest of drawers moves to the center. The camera's movement then focuses on the lattice wall in the middle ground, moving closer to a wooden key holder. A hand enters from the bottom right foreground, reaching toward the center to touch a padlock on the holder, which becomes the central focus as the camera pushes in slightly, placing the hand and lock in the foreground against the wooden wall background.

A small kitchenette area contains a mini-fridge under a wooden countertop, along with a black electric kettle. A white electric heater is mounted on the wall, and festive decorations, including small gnomes and a decorative tree, are placed on the furniture.
